divs: Sighting DetailsWe were inside on the computer and it turned off all of a sudden. So we checkedoutside at the power lines and saw a see-through object coming toward theground. We also saw lights flashing. We started to get really scared and wehid. We watched from a distance and took pictures of it, well, kindof squirtingout gas like liquid. Its hard to describe. Transparent. Well all of a suddenit got up and flew away. But the shadows all around are, its almost like thereis something there. Im afraid to go near a shadow now. Sometimes i still seethings there.
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Ottawa
There were no other sightings in Ottawa on or around December 29th 2002
